name: get_date_and_time_by_timezone
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool location_and_time.
Tool description: A collection of location and time utilities. You can search for country/city information worldwide, find out distance between two locations/cities, get location data from IP address, solve any time questions regarding different timezones, get sunrise/sunset times at any location, get holiday information worldwide, and much more!
API description: Gets the current date and time for a specified timezone using the Location and Time API.

timezone.description: Specify time zone from the response of `/timezone` endpoint.
